website_summaries.verdict: These bulbs stand out not only for their high quality, but also for their excellent packaging and good value, making them a top choice.
pros: Users love their beautiful traditional look and white glow, and praise both the appearance and sturdy packaging that keep the bulbs intact during shipping
We like that they give off a good amount of light and look equally attractive whether on or off
cons: A few reported a slight buzzing when dimming, and a few customers said the bulbs burned out too quickly

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I first opened these! EXACTLY what I wanted. Unfortunately they are cheaply made. I have only used this bulb a few times and when I went to change it into a new lamp that I bought specifically for it, it fell apart. Update 10/25/17: After posting my original review the company contacted me and told me that they are a family owned company and they would like to send me a replacement, which they promptly did. I was very impressed with the customer service and I like to support family owned business so I will be ordering all replacement bulbs from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: L Alexander

customer_reviews.title: The product has a clear glass shell and the filament ...
customer_reviews.text: The product has a clear glass shell and the filament glows with more of a traditional white-ish glow (which is to say not orange). This is exactly what I was looking for. Most lights of this type (aka Edison Bulb) sold at the big box stores are advertised as "Amber" glowing which I don't prefer. Thank you Hudson Lighting for providing a quality light product at a value price!
customer_reviews.author: Mishians

customer_reviews.title: Good BUT BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: It is a good-looking light bulb it came package very well the only problem I have I was putting it in my kitchen over my Island and the light is too yellow. If it were going in a family room bedroom not for reading it would be a great bulb but not in the kitchen where you're trying to cook! I will keep them and use them around the house. I just ordered the white cool light bulb that is very similar to this one and those work great for your kitchen or for reading.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hermansen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vintage light bulb
customer_reviews.text: I received this vintage Edison Bulb in a well packaged box with each light bulb nicely packed and protected. I installed and tested the product in different dimming setting using the Lutron HomeWorks light controller. So far the product is performing to perfection. The brightness is 230 Lumens and the bulb is beautifully constructed. I have a need for several more of these light bulbs but I am looking for a brighter bulb in the range of 300 to 450 Lumens and I hope Hudson will introduce new products with the higher Lumens rating.
customer_reviews.author: Benzano

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lighting
customer_reviews.text: The Edison light bulbs are stylish and fun. I bought them for two bathrooms, because of selling a house and wanting to update the bathroom lighting without the exspense of changing the fixtures. Replacing ugly old bulbs with these completely changed the look of the bathrooms and made the lighting so much better. The bulbs were in a nice box with special forms indented into foam for protection. You could even give these as a gift -- that is how perfect they are packaged. Now I have to get them for all over my house!
customer_reviews.author: D. K. Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Light bulbs arrived on time with no issues. They looked great and exactly as described. My only issue with them was that they produced way too much heat. We needed 12 bulbs for our dining room light fixture and with the amount of heat it was giving off they were a bad fit. I loved the style and the look. In comparison to an LED light bulb these were the best, if it wasn't for the heat I would have loved them even more.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These gorgeous bulbs are perfect for my new desk lamps! I just love the aura they give to my room with the soft (yet substantial) light they project in my office. The customer service is awesome too! I had one of the bulbs burn out after only a few hours of use, and they quickly answered my emails and promptly sent me a replacement bulb free of charge. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Allison L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: All 8 bulbs arrived well packaged and intact! Since I have an 8 light fixture, that made me very happy! They look beautiful in my fixture over my dining room table and I will not hesitate to repurchase from Hudson Lighting next time. Shipping was fast-very happy!
customer_reviews.author: keu

customer_reviews.title: Used light bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: One of the light bulbs arrived burnt out! It seems as though it had already been used! I ordered these 4 light bulbs for our hanging lights over our new island. Luckily, I only needed three working light bulbs because the 4th arrived defective and burnt out. Very disappointed. Overall, the light bulbs are what I expected. A subtle (not very bright) yellow light.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Calderon-Santacoloma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful- modernizes an old light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and really modernizes an outdated "Hollywood" light fixture in my guest bathroom. 4 bulbs does give enough light however, it might be too dim to apply makeup. But I have two other light fixtures in the ceiling as well, so these bulbs give plenty of light above the mirror for standard use of the bathroom. Fast shipping and well packaged, there was no breakage upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Really great Edison bulbs and value
customer_reviews.text: Really great Edison bulbs and value! Cheaper than most places. The only thing I would say is that 60w is pretty bright especially if you're using this on a standalone lamp without a shade. However, since these are dimmable, I attached a dimmable switch so that I could dim the light more - and now it looks great! If you don't have a dimmable switch, would recommend getting a lower wattage.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 24 of these (6 boxes of 4) for a new light fixture we had custom made. The light fixture has sockets for 12 bulbs, but we also wanted spares. We tested each of the 24 bulbs and all of them work perfectly. We loved that the glass was clear, that that the bulbs were big, and that they were actual incandescent bulbs. There is no comparison to the LED versions that you see in home improvement stores. Seeing each individual filament in the light is incredible. We couldn't be happier with these.
customer_reviews.author: Todd W. Kap-Kopp

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft lighting
customer_reviews.text: All bulbs arrived intact but appreciated the early email in case one was broken and who to contact. 100% satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karin T

customer_reviews.title: Bright, clear, & aesthetically pleasing!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and with no breakage. Looks exactly as the photos depict. They are bright and clear and look amazing on my old copper lamp. Will stick with these for future purchases! I also know that it was an auto email that I received de the company, but they offered to make anything right that wasn't. That's a sign of good online customer service. Luckily, there were no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damage free, which is was a concern with lightbulbs. Very well packaged, I love the ambiance of the amber, especially in the winter, I plan on buying the brighter color during the summer months. Lots of compliments. Very well made, glass is thick even impressed my difficult decorating diva neighbor. She's probably ordered herself some already. Definitely not a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs look awesome! They provide a good amount of light while not being too bright. Even better is Hudson Lighting's customer service. One of the bulbs was damaged in shipping, I emailed them and the issue was pleasantly resolved within a couple hours. Very very happy and I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: P Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Hudson vintage lighting
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived well packed and all in good condition. Beautiful light bulbs! I shopped around and found these lights at a really good price. The lights look wonderful when! I couldn't be happier and I highly recommend Hudson Lighting!
customer_reviews.author: aawillis

customer_reviews.title: The best Edison bulb I have found.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this bulb is perfect. It is packaged in the most thoughtful and professional way possible. The bulb itself is a work of art. I have a dimmer on it and I love the way it goes from a nice bright to an intense warm. If you are looking for the best in Edison style lighting, this it it. The clear, shiny glass and with its filament even looks great when off. Price/Quality/Style/Light...in my opinion, the best of everything. I have tried about 5 brands/styles of bulbs for this light fixture. This bulb is a clear winner!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Form over function with these bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs came packaged beautifully; I was impressed. These bulbs look great in a clear fixture, but if you need them for task lighting you should get something else, such as an LED Edison bulb. The light is more of an amber glow than a warm white. I bought them for my pendants over the kitchen island, but sadly had to switch them out to an uglier LED bulb. These will look great in a wall sconce or a light that is used more for ambience. I am keeping them for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: T. Elbert

customer_reviews.title: The light is very reddish in color and not very bright
customer_reviews.text: The light itself looks nice and does dim well, but I'm unhappy with how much of a red tint it has (must be somewhere in the 2,500 kelvin range??). It's not in the standard warm-white wavelength of 3,500k that most household bulbs are these days. It also does not get very bright. I'm not sure if this is true for all of these vintage LED bulbs, but next time I would shop around before re-buying these.
customer_reviews.author: pinwheelsunshine

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size for my new light and as someone else ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pendant light with a glass shade and have probably spent $75 on different lightbulbs that didn't look quite right. I did have a "regular" shaped Edison light, but it didn't take up enough room in the shade and looked odd. I am really liking this squirrel cage light bulb. It's the perfect size for my new light and as someone else commented, the glow is whiter and brighter than other Edison bulbs. It's unique without looking too old-fashioned, which is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Wojda

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to our kitchen pendant lights!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bulbs to use in pendant lights that have clear glass seeded shades. Look absolutely amazing when turned on showing trunthe glass shade - nice addition to our kitchen. These were packed very well with plenty of packing and bubble wrap - no damage at all. I am going to order more for another Light fixture - love the look!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but dimmer than expected.
customer_reviews.text: They are quite dim and one came pre-broken so that was a negative. I like the antique, they are beautiful with the fixture we ordered. Regarding the dimness, they are more dim than I was expecting. I was expecting 60W but these seemed more like half of that. We have a dark yellow accent wall in our kitchen and now it looks like a cantina. I keep ordering cerveza and I'm the only one who thinks I'm funny. I'm going to check into seeing if other "colors" are available with whiter light but I still love the look of the Edison bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light bulbs. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two packages of 4 light bulbs for my new 8 light fixture. I didn't open each box right when I received them because my fixture had not been installed yet. While the electrician was installing, I opened up my bulbs to find that one of the eight had broken in transit. I emailed Hudson to let them know that and they promptly replied with a promo code to receive a new bulb. The bulbs look great and are exactly as advertised, while being significantly less expensive than Home Depot or Lowe's. I will be purchasing more for replacement bulbs soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These bulbs are really pretty. They are very warm though
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are really pretty. They are very warm though. They have a yellowy orange cast to them so they really are just for mood and not a task light. Even though they say 60 watt they are not as bright as a 60 watt regular all purpose light bulb. They only give off 230 lumens so they aren't bright enough for our kitchen island. I will use them in another lamp in our home. They are packed well and came in tact and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Picturegirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lighting!
customer_reviews.text: My wife saw these at a local hardware store, they were $10 a bulb, and although I love to shop local, that was a little too pricey for me! I found these on Amazon, saw they had a good review and a Great Price, so I thought, ill give them a shot! When they arived I gave them to my wife and she just fell in love with them! Exactly what she wanted, they went into our bathroom and the light is perfect. We are using them in a 3 light fixture! Will definitely buy more if needed!
customer_reviews.author: MoonManTom

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged, nice light
customer_reviews.text: We have a new light fixture with vintage Edison bulbs and wanted to be sure we had replacement bulbs before we need them. I read tons of reviews...of this provider and several others...and was concerned about broken bulbs, especially as this type of bulb is not really cheap. No worries about these! They came very well packaged, each in an individual box, each in bubble wrap. The fixtures are bright and also dimmable, the soft glow of the vintage bulb bu not too yellow. I will not hesitate to purchase more from Hudson Lighting when w need them. And I did NOT receive free or discounted product for this review.
customer_reviews.author: CPH-MA

customer_reviews.title: Love these clear vintage bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs were very well packaged. I have a floor lamp with the vintage look of wire cages. It came with Edison type bulbs that were yellow tinted and they weren’t as bright as I hoped. These clear bulbs give the extra brightness I hoped for. I love them. They arrived quickly and the company contacted me to make sure they arrived unscathed. Good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations! I don't write too many reviews but in this case I'll make an exception. These bulbs are beautiful giving off warm natural light. The packaging and presentation was also well beyond what you would normally see for most bulbs. Overall, I am highly satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bladerunner044

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs are nice, but it shows a yellow filament in the advertising. It isn’t yellow. I bought these to match another bulb that I already own and it does not. What I was looking for is a clear bright light with the yellow filament. I’ll use them in other lighting situation but now I need to look again for the bulb I actually want
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Light bulbs for front door chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Love the light bulbs. They are very bright and that is what we needed for our front door at night, We have only had them for a couple of months as that is when we replaced our front door light and purchased them. Regarding longevity that is all I can address. We are happy with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Hopkdiva

customer_reviews.title: Like the old fashioned look
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t been able to use this product yet due to the fact we are in the process of remodeling our kitchen and the pendant lights are not hanging yet. I did show these bulbs to my electrician and he was impressed by them and said these are nice. I like the old fashioned looking bulbs and l can’t wait to see what they look like once we can use them.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki1471

customer_reviews.title: Great Bulb!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with it. Because it's exposed it's important to be pretty and functional. It is. My bed isn't made so I didn't take a picture of the whole room but it does work well. It's doesn't have the problem of being glaring. It's nice for reading which I use it for mostly. Great service with the bulbs packaged perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs look great
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought a new house and wanted the pendant lights over our island to make a statement. We ordered these light bulbs on Amazon and they did not disappoint. They are not super bright, but that's not what they're meant for. We have not tried with a dimmer yet, but hope to soon.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful look
customer_reviews.text: We just put up a new dining room pendant light and used these bulbs. The fixture is a farmhouse style and these bulbs look really good. They give off a soft light so if you're looking for bright light, you'll need to use a different bulb. My fixture has 3 bulbs and I think I would like a little brighter light but we'll see. It's only turned on at night since the room has a lot of natural light so it may be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: not your grandad's light bulb?
customer_reviews.text: This retro bulb was an easy upgrade to my living room ceiling fan where they contribute significantly to the first impression of the rather outdated hub. I feel I can put off replacing the fan now. The bulbs' color complements the relaxed feel of the room while providing enough light for gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: Reader in Texas

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was originally looking for LED bulbs in this form. I did not notice that these were not LED bulbs. I blame Amazon's suggestions because the seller was very clear when I looked back on it. Despite that fact they work exactly as intended. Great product if it is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Bhosley

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and modern
customer_reviews.text: I had an old 80s-era light fixture with big globe bulbs in our guest bathroom. I replaced the ugly white globes with sleek, modern Edison bulbs & it instantly brought the room into this century! Now for a little paint to hide the ugly wood...
customer_reviews.author: Admiral Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an excess of these expecting duds due to the negative reviews. While it's still probably wise, I had absolutely no issues during installation. 10/10 bulbs are still working. They are brighter than you might think, and work fantastic with a dimmer. Very attractive design, pictures can't do it justice. Warning: These get HOT.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas R.

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these lights to update a chandelier. I'm very happy with the lights and especially like the warm glow they give rather than the stark white of other bulbs. They were packaged very well. I would strongly suggest these to anyone looking to update their lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Family Gal

customer_reviews.title: looks good but low lumens not very bright ok for hallway
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way it looked once installed , however as night approached I noticed the dimness, the lumens were too low, I then replaced with another bulb with over 800 lumens and it looked so much better. I returned product and got a refund. it might be ok for a hallway or where light is needed as much I was trying to use for a kitchen and it wasn't nearly as bright as needed.
customer_reviews.author: ed staniszewski

customer_reviews.title: Warm glow with a vintage nod
customer_reviews.text: The warm glow of the amber Edison bulbs is the perfect light level for my entry. Our fixture has 8 bulbs, so it was important to find the right lighting level, to not blind guests as they enter the house. I couldn't be happier with the performance of these vintage-inspired bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: H Deers

customer_reviews.title: Watts just aren’t what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: These look great but I need LOTS OF LIGHT to put on make up. Too dim for my taste. I can’t seem to find any light bulbs for any fixture that provide adequate lighting anymore. Plus you just about have to have a PhD to buy light bulbs these days. These were a nice quality, just not bright enough.👀
customer_reviews.author: #gonetothedogs

customer_reviews.title: beautiful! exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs were a bit larger than I expected but I did not really look at the size closely. They will work fine and are exactly what I was looking for. Much nicer than anything I have seen in the big box hardware stores. They came in a box with each bulb safely secured by much cushioning. Will definitely order from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs turn grey/black from certain batches.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 boxes of these for all the lights I. Our kitchen and the bulbs from one of the boxes have turned grey while the other ones have not. And it’s definitely the bulbs and not the light fixtures because one of our fixtures has many lights and used bulbs from each box on that fixture and only one did not turn grey.
customer_reviews.author: caroline holst

customer_reviews.title: Bonus Warranty
customer_reviews.text: The style of these bulbs is beautiful and coordinated with the lighting fixture we purchased for over the sink in our kitchen. The Bonus 1 year warranty with registration gives me confidence that the company believes their product will deliver long bulb life.
customer_reviews.author: savvy senior

customer_reviews.title: Much Brighter Than Others
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other bulbs which haven't been bright enough for my use. The bulbs aren't tinted and the light is a whiter and brighter which is a necessity. They still have a warm, vintage glow when lit and I can dim them to the other lower brightness when I don't need the additional light!! Great price and Amazon Prime!!!
customer_reviews.author: breezy622

customer_reviews.title: They are nice and last a long time but for some reason ...
customer_reviews.text: I've bought quite a few of these. They are nice and last a long time but for some reason there's always one in a set that has a slight yellowish "tint" to it, which is fine if it's by itself, but if you have several pendant lights next to each other you can tell when the lights are off. Not sure how or if I could just get a replacement as I don't want to send the whole set back for one bulb. Other than that they are nice unfortunately every set I've bought has one that's funny.
customer_reviews.author: B Mo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, soft light. I was very impressed with how they were packaged! Arrived safely and quickly! I replace an old light cover with one I made from chicken wire, zip ties and an old lampshade frame. I did a lot of comparison shopping and found these bulbs to be thes best value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: D. Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Nice bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Great bulbs but to bright for me. I switched to an Amber 40 Watt. Oakleaf I believe. They put out a lot of heat. Not anything to be concerned "saftey" wise but moved my Nest Thermostat 2%. So moved the fixture lowered the wattage for the right look.
customer_reviews.author: Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Decorative Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are great for decorative use to get that vintage farmhouse look. They give a rather yellow cast, so if you are looking for a bright bulb to light up a room, this isn't the bulb for you. I used them in my bathroom along with recessed LED lights, so work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great with a rustic light fixture
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these for my grandson, along with a light fixture. He was remodelling and decorating his bedroom and Grama (me) had him pick something he wanted for his new room. These bulbs look great with the fixture he chose. He loves the look!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D

customer_reviews.title: looks nice
customer_reviews.text: nice product. one of the four bulbs sent to me was broken and tgey did replace it although I had to pay for shipping in which is pretty lame..
customer_reviews.author: knort

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my nightstand lights in my master bedroom when I remodeled it and I am obsessed with them. I love that the light is soft and warm and the bulb itself is so beautifully made. The packaging was perfect, each bulb secured separately. I think the pictures speak for themselves. I WILL buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful light bulbs for accent lighting
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful light bulbs for accent lighting. I bought two clear glass shade light fixtures and the bulbs glow beautifully in them. They do not give off light that is bright enough for reading though, so consider that when you make your purchase. They were very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan Granny

customer_reviews.title: Good, but big, Edison bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and function of these Edison bulbs. My only problem is that Amazon recommended them for a small-ish lamp and these bulbs are longer than the lampshade. I will be finding something smaller for the lamp but will still use these bulbs elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too darn hot!
customer_reviews.text: While these lightbulbs look pretty, they are very hot!!!! This heat somehow also transferred to the dimmer switch and made it very hot and I was afraid it was a fire hazard, so I took them out. When I replaced the bulbs with another brand all the heat was gone! They also were not as bright and more yellow than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: OperaLovingTenor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ambiance
customer_reviews.text: Love these bulbs in my new pendant light!  Kitchen is under remodel and this is just the look I wanted. Soft amber light, but bright enough for above the table. Bulbs were well packaged and included a glove for handling the bulbs. Cannot speak to longevity since they were just installed this week. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KCarey

customer_reviews.title: STYLISH BUT TOO DIM
customer_reviews.text: When I received these bulbs I was very excited. They were very stylish and a pretty design. However, when I install them I do not like the amber color it had and it did not give me enough light in my basement even though I purchased two sets, total of 4. So unless you like the low/amber lighting this bulb may not be for you but then again it might.
customer_reviews.author: Katie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Vintage-Style Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I needed an Edison-style bulb for a new light fixture, so I thought I would give these a shot. So far, so good. They were packaged very well, and give off a cozy orange-yellow glow. The bulbs look great, and I’m a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The bulb came apart after I screwed it into my new lamp. It seems like the bulb was put together with glue as the glue was crusting off of the bulb. Had to use pliers to take out the other end that was stuck in my lamp!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cascarelli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service/good look!
customer_reviews.text: This company emailed me to check and make sure the light bulbs arrived in good condition so I thought that was awesome! I haven’t used them yet but they arrived perfect and they have the look I needed. I’ll update once we install the light fixture but so far I’m impressed just with the customer service alone. :)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love these bulbs in my kitchen fixture they are a blast from the past of course and beautiful. They throw off plenty of light. A dimmer switch helps control it. They were so beautifully packaged when they arrived. I knew there was no chance for breakage. I will definitely order these again. Thank you .
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are beautiful with our new pendant lighting. I love the warm glow and the patterned light it casts on the ceiling. Well worth the extra dollars! The product arrived nicely packaged. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DMG and co

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service! One bulb came broken and they sent a replacement quickly and without fuss. Will be definitely getting more bulbs from Hudson Lighting. Had the bulbs working for about 2 months so fa with no issues, and as an added bonus they are dimmable.
customer_reviews.author: capricious

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These were just perfect for new outside lights. Arrived early, look great. I would highly recommend. Our house was ten years old and new outside lights with these bulbs really provide an updated look.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Lights look amazing. Adds a ton of character to a room. However these do radiate some heat. The electrician I used to install new light fixtures with these bulbs told me they burnout quickly. But I’m still going to order more.
customer_reviews.author: allegra

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lightbulbs
customer_reviews.text: The lightbulbs are well crafted and arrived safely. Perfect addition to the inexpensive ceiling light fixtures we put in our mud room. They definitely have a yellowish glow, but they worked well for us.
customer_reviews.author: dserandall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Light bulbs when you want a little extra
customer_reviews.text: Since you can see the bulbs in our bathroom fixtures, I wanted a more decorative bulb. These fit the bill perfectly! The filament is very beautiful and interesting to look at. Adds a little extra flair to a newly remodeled room. The 2100K rating is very warm and yellow looking. I love it but make sure that is the look you want. You can order "cooler" bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bengston

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs for an industrial look
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs were just right in order for me to achieve the industrial look I was going for. They came very well packaged and look so stylish! They give out a warm bright light that reminds me of sunshine. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia, MA

customer_reviews.title: Nice bulbs
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly and the price was very good compared to other comparable bulbs. My only disappointment is they are not as bright as I would like/have a yellow hue. Overall pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Whitehouse

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and pictured
customer_reviews.text: Love the vintage bulbs in my kitchen fixture. I had ordered some supposedly dimmable bulbs in the past. They didn't work with my dimmer. These are perfect. They came when they were supposed to come and they were well packed to avoid breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Patty G

customer_reviews.title: Edison Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Great item at great price! The light from these bulbs really change the look and feel of a room. Glad I can find a incandescent bulb that lasts like they did when they were originally made.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: So Happy I Found These Bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these bulbs! They look like a piece of art and add so much to my clear pendants above my kitchen island. I am happy as well to get rid of the LED bulbs I had previously. The light from these vintage bulbs is soft and warm just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful lights
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on new outdoor fixtures. The color was perfect, the look is exactly the way I pictured them. Not artificial looking. Really makes the front of the house look good.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Hammack

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I used these lights for my remodeled bathroom and they look and work great. I went with a industrial/rustic look. I also have them on a dimmer switch and no issues with that either. They do get very warm, i will probably like them better in the colder months but they do heat up my small bathroom. Very pleased with them so far, I cannot comment on the longevity since it's only been 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Jade M.

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs make a buzzing sound. All of them. Switched with different LED bulbs no more sound. Color is also off. Obviously a very cheep bulb, Not worth it. Returning them now.
customer_reviews.author: C/J

customer_reviews.title: more color then it appears on line
customer_reviews.text: they seem to be a touch more " yellowish " then I would have liked, but this may just take some getting used to . also the bulbs received do not look like the bulbs you offer, they do not have the have the "inner lighting" as pictured. these have a clear tubing that only gets the Edison appearance when turned on. disappointing feature
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Character
customer_reviews.text: I like this old-style bulb in a conspicuous hanging lamp above my pub table just off the kitchen. this is on a dimmer and it is cool when dimmed so you can see the filament design...I will let you know how durable the bulb is...
customer_reviews.author: fargozombie

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY...LIGHTS LOOK BURNT
customer_reviews.text: I just got the package today and haven’t even installed the bulbs in my pendant lights. All of the bulbs have a damaged spot that looks like they have been used and burned. The material looks cheap and easy to catch fire which does not make me feel secure. Very disappointed in this purchase, will be reaching out to the company tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful bulb
customer_reviews.text: I needed a decorative bulb to go into my clear glass shade. I tried several LED bulbs but none worked properly. I thought I would try these incandescent bulbs and they are perfect. It is difficult to photograph bulbs, but I dimmed it to try to show the filaments. Very pleased and works perfectly with this light fitting
customer_reviews.author: HJC

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving these bulbs 5 stars based on delivery -- quick and in great shape -- and on the way they look. The light is a soft, warm, amber color, perfect with our new (but vintage-looking) bronze fixtures. They've only been up for a couple of days, so I can't speak to durability, but they're very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Story Lady

customer_reviews.title: These are great bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered some last year and put them in a half bath and a lamp. They cast the perfect amount of muted light. Not too bright. I just replaced the bulbs in my dining room with these. It is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: TinFish

customer_reviews.title: Great looking lightbulbs
customer_reviews.text: Got a whole box of these awesome looking lightbulbs for the price of one dang bulb elsewhere. LOVE them - they look great in light fixtures where the bulbs show. Loved them so much I already ordered a 2nd box to keep them on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST FOR ELEGANT, SOFT LIGHTING.
customer_reviews.text: Hudson is my find of the year. I despise LED lights, and now the 'regular' incandescents are getting brighter and brighter. Hudson has lovely incandecents -- they even look vintage -- and incandescent Christmas tree lights as well. Lots of choices, and both provide good light and a warm tone.
customer_reviews.author: GBM

customer_reviews.title: Really nice glow
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs have a yellow glow which is a nice color for my bathroom which is yellow with red accents. They could be a smidge brighter but with the ceiling light on, they are perfect. Really like them with the associated light fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: AJZum

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not for long hours of usage
customer_reviews.text: I love the way that they look and they glow so pretty! I use them for long hours in my kitchen (they are on almost all day everyday) and the glass darkens over time from the heat. The other bulbs that are used occasionally or for for short periods are holding up great though. Love the look and the price
customer_reviews.author: Homemaker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but more than half were soddered on crooked
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful bulbs, I bought 8 for a chandelier and a couple outdoor lights but more than half of them had the bulb soddered onto the screw part at an angle so when they looked all crooked when screwed in next to each other. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny4ever

customer_reviews.title: Rustic Style
customer_reviews.text: Perfect purchase! We’re building a new half bath, so I am using in my new rustic hanging light fixture. Really like the look and price point as compared to Wayfair!
customer_reviews.author: Redhds

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: We used these lights in a bathroom vanity. Very bright and beautiful. I will say at first I thought they sent me the wrong item; it was packaged so well and so nicely I thought for sure it couldn’t just be light bulbs, but it was!
customer_reviews.author: bullery

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Vintage Light Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these vintage light bulbs. They arrived well packed and on time. I purchased two packs of four and installed five out of the eight on my dining room chandelier. They all worked and they look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: The lights are sooo perfect!! They are bright enough to light up your full desk, but also your full room as well as a floor lamp. It’s bright but easy on the eyes and dimmed shade of color. I just love them and my box has a few bulbs so I already know I won’t have to order for some time. But I’ll definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: One bulb burned out within 1 hour of placing. Thank goodness I have an extra. Let’s see how long the other three last. Very dim. Work well for night light
customer_reviews.author: S. Green

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are gorgeous....just know that the soft white and amber are very low light. I love how they look in my wire cages and intend to order the clear for a brighter glow.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for casting warm light
customer_reviews.text: Product received was exactly as described, fast shipping, and arrived in perfect condition. Edison bulbs are not bright but cast a warm light that’s just right for accent lamps. I’ve used 3 so far and they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi H Novelli

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged. What I like about these is they weren't too 'amber', as some are. I'm using three of them in a vintage style bathroom, and they work perfectly. Will be buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Marie

customer_reviews.title: These lights are nice looking but turn them on and they are a bright yellow.not soft yellow light.
customer_reviews.text: These Edison bulbs are nice looking but turn them on and they are a bright yellow glow.. not soft yellow light...YUCK! They are going back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: K. Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Nice high quality lights, ¡ que fancy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light bulbs, I bought them for our new bathroom light fixture. These are an amber color, not bright white, which is really nice. Not too harsh in the early mornings :).
customer_reviews.author: duder

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely packaged. They are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They arrived without breakage. Very nicely packaged. They are beautiful. Especially liked learning about the team effort between Hudson Lighting and Watts of Love...wonderful humanitarian effort! The world would be a better place with more folks like you.
customer_reviews.author: Architectural Firm, South Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Great value on vintage style bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second package of these. LOVE the packaging, bulbs are nestled in more than adequate packaging that is attractive too. Bulbs are great! A little bigger than the ones I had purchased from Target. I love the soft, slightly yellow glow. Work great with my farmhouse decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

product_meta.title: Vintage Incandescent Edison Light Bulbs: 60 Watt, 2100K Warm White Lightbulbs - E26 Base - 230 Lumens - Clear Glass - Dimmable Antique Filament ST64 Light Bulb Set - 4 Pack
feature_bullets: ✅ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We are a US-based company with exceptional and responsive customer service! We work closely with our manufacturers to produce a top-quality Edison bulb for our customers.
✅ DIMMER COMPATIBLE: Adjust the brightness to fit any setting with these Edison Light Bulbs. Use with a Leviton or Lutron dimmer switch for optimal results.
✅ BEST USE: This vintage light bulb uses 60 watts of power and features a standard-sized, E26 base which is suited for most lighting applications.
✅ STYLE: Clear glass paired with Edison-style, exposed filaments give these decorative light bulbs a classic, throwback look while emitting a warm, soft glow.
✅ GIVING BACK: A portion of your Edison bulb purchase goes back to Watts of Love – a charitable organization focused on bringing light to those that need it most.
